content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 64-71)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at (16.0, 71.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### Copper Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at (-46.0, 71.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### New Iron Ore Mining Facility at (30.0, 70.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### Iron Processing Facility at (36.0, 74.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### Partial Iron Processing Setup at (37.0, 73.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### New Iron Processing Line at (36.0, 91.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### Direct Smelting Setup at (38.0, 72.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### New Iron Processing Line at (37.0, 88.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### New Iron Processing Line at (38.0, 86.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### New Iron Processing Line at (37.0, 73.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### New Iron Processing Line at (38.0, 72.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### Optimized Iron Processing Line at (36.0, 74.0)
(No changes from previous report)

### Functional Iron Processing Line at (37.0, 82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (37.0, 82.0) producing iron ore (fuel: 42 coal)
- Stone furnace at (37.0, 84.0) smelting iron plates (fuel: 50 coal)
- Burner inserter at (38.5, 84.5) transferring plates (fuel: 23 coal)
- Output wooden chest at (39.5, 84.5) storing 56 iron plates
- Current throughput: ~19 iron plates per minute

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement distance errors (recurring)
- Move within 10 tiles of target position before placing entities (occurred at (36.5,83.5) and (37.5,83.0))
- Verify player position relative to build location
- Implement movement commands before placement attempts

### Inventory management errors (new)
- Check entity inventory capacity before inserting items (furnace fuel inventory full at 50/50)
- Monitor fuel levels to prevent overfilling burner devices
- Implement inventory checks before insertion attempts

### Output blockage issues (persistent)
- Clear items blocking drill output at (37.5,83.5)
- Ensure furnace input area is properly aligned with drill output
- Implement regular output blockage checks

### Alignment verification (expanded)
- Confirm exact coordinates for entity connections (drill drop vs furnace input)
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions match intended flow
- Implement coordinate validation before placement

### Fuel management (expanded)
- Monitor fuel levels across all burner devices
- Implement scheduled refueling routines
- Balance fuel distribution between devices

### Building sequence optimization (maintained)
- Continue following logical build order (drill → furnace → inserter → chest)
- Verify connections immediately after placement
- Test with small quantities before full operation

## NAMESPACE

No functions have been defined by the agent yet.
